name: Care 4 the Critter (prototype)
description:
In Care 4 the Critter, you can show the small winged critter the path to follow by drawing a line on the screen and keep pressing to hurry it up and reach the goal flag. Be careful to avoid the moving rocks and pitfalls and make sure to reach the goal before nightfall. 

Game concept by Pablo J. Gorigortia at https://gorigoitia.itch.io/
